define([ "../core", "./var/rsingleTag", "../manipulation" // buildFragment ], function( jQuery, rsingleTag ) {

data: string of html context (optional): If specified, the fragment will be created in this context, defaults to document keepScripts (optional): If true, will include scripts passed in the html string

jQuery.parseHTML = function( data, context, keepScripts ) { if ( !data || typeof data !== "string" ) { return null; } if ( typeof context === "boolean" ) { keepScripts = context; context = false; } context = context || document; var parsed = rsingleTag.exec( data ), scripts = !keepScripts && [];

Single tag

if ( parsed ) { return [ context.createElement( parsed[1] ) ]; } parsed = jQuery.buildFragment( [ data ], context, scripts ); if ( scripts && scripts.length ) { jQuery( scripts ).remove(); } return jQuery.merge( [], parsed.childNodes ); }; return jQuery.parseHTML; });
